definition: not well/out of sorts/in a bad mood/without discrepancy/accurate
not to deviate an iota (idiom)/to be extremely accurate
not to deviate one hair's breadth (idiom)/to be extremely accurate

sentences.english: I felt uncomfortable, and even afraid, of going out by myself.
sentences.chinese: 我很是不爽，甚至都害怕自个儿出去买东西了。

sentences.english: The Buddha has always warned us against karmic retribution.
sentences.chinese: 佛说因果报应丝毫不爽。

sentences.english: The calculations made by computers are perfectly accurate.
sentences.chinese: 计算机的计算毫发不爽。

sentences.english: Embarrassingly, she was wearing the same top as me.
sentences.chinese: 更令姐不爽的是，她穿了一件和我一样的抹胸。

sentences.english: This is an example of karmic retribution and how inescapable it is.
sentences.chinese: 你们看因果报应何等不爽。

sentences.english: I've done this for many years and it works like a charm, " said the director.
sentences.chinese: 这就像个魔咒一样，我这么些年屡试不爽。

sentences.english: For the past for years. Gray's forecasts have been nearly on the nose.
sentences.chinese: 过去四年，格雷的预测几乎丝毫不爽。

sentences.english: Krauss says Americans also felt threatened by Japanese purchases of iconic U. S. companies and real estate.
sentences.chinese: 美国对日本购进美国商标和房地产还是感觉很不爽。

sentences.english: We all have bad days at work.
sentences.chinese: 工作中总有那么几天让人很不爽。

sentences.english: Even in my sleep-deprived state I've managed to pull off one of my classic pranks.
sentences.chinese: 即使处于睡眠不足状态，我的恶作剧还是屡试不爽。

sentences.english: If it makes you uncomfortable, we feel very sorry for it.
sentences.chinese: 若果这件事情使你感到不爽我们感到非常的抱歉。

sentences.english: Krauss says Americans also felt threatened by Japanese purchases of iconic U.S. companies and real estate."You
sentences.chinese: 美国对日本购进美国商标和房地产还是感觉很不爽。

sentences.english: Her weird hairdo really bummed her boyfriend out.
sentences.chinese: 她那奇怪的发型让男友感到很不爽。

sentences.english: Oh, Dady, I feel bad now because there is no any applause.
sentences.chinese: 爸爸，没有什么掌声，感觉太不爽了。

definition: to blow one's top/to be driven mad/to become frantic
variant of 憤憤不平|愤愤不平[fen4 fen4 bu4 ping2]
to be disgusted with/to dislike/bad reaction/antipathy
